title: The Life or Death Race to Get Aid to Indonesia
description:
(Sorry we're late!)
In a race against time, responders and nonprofit organizations are rushing to the city of Palu, Indonesia following last week's devastating earthquake and tsunami. David Meyers speaks with Susan Mangicaro, the Emergency Team Lead for International Medical Corps, on her team's efforts to get aid to those who need it. 
FOLLOW UP 
You can learn more about International Medical Corps’ relief efforts at: internationalmedicalcorps.org
---- 
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
